name: The Legend of Fortune and Immortality
description: A self-propelled AFK game, real-time combat. A groundbreaking treasure, the slot machine treasure increases damage based on sieve points. It is thrown once before each instance and can be enhanced with various gems. Random equipment can be upgraded, and there are also random monsters.,

name: Ascention Suvivor
description: AscensionSurvivor is a roguelike action game where you survive against approaching enemies using unique weapons and customizable ability sets. With roguelike elements, players also inflate, but enemies are strengthened just as much or even more. Do your best to survive!

name: Galactix
description: Pilot your way through the relentless Xidus Fleet in an attempt to save the earth from annihilation. Galactix is a space arcade type game where you pilot your ship to shoot enemy fighters and collect bonus's with your ships mechanical arm. Galactix also includes a new Enhanced Mode to play.

name: Havoc Heirs
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Family Sharing
description: A fantasy turn-based RPG with horror elements and an interconnected world. Monsters are everywhere, and you may end up being one of them.

name: Hiraeth -銀月殘憶- Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Captions available;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime
description: 《Hiraeth～銀月殘憶》是一款日式西幻劇情文字遊戲，你將會扮演一個失去記憶的主角，遇見性格鮮明的可攻略角色們，透過選擇劇情中出現的不同選項，影響故事發展，並逐步探索潛伏在平靜表面下的真相。 你的真正身份是什麼？是一個普通的平民？還是珍貴的聖子聖女？深埋在你記憶底層裏的那個久遠的祕密，會告訴你你真正的身份是什麼，你真正的過去又是什麼…… 面對難以決擇的選項，你又會怎麼選擇，走向怎麼樣的結局呢…… 免費試玩版支持繁體中文及簡體中文，劇情只佔完整版的20％左右，遊玩時間為約2小時。文字量約為8萬字左右，以選擇劇情出現的選項為推進遊戲的方式。 【性別可選主角×6個可攻略角色×40萬字以上劇本】
